doc.field: New York City Department of Information and Technology.

The "Open_space" dataset is a polygon representation of New York City parks and open space. The data is comprised of polygon geometries with attribute information. Feature classifications include: 1. Ball fields within park, 2. Cemetery Outline, 3. Hard surface courts within park, 4. Parking areas within park, 5. Playgrounds within park, 6. Pools within park, 7. Recreational area over 2 acres, 8. Skating rinks within park.

New York City Open Space, Cemetery Outline, Recreational area over 2 acres, Ball fields within park, Hard surface courts within park, Playgrounds within park, Pools within park, Skating rinks within park and Parking areas within park.
